However, if the purchase amount exceeds $2000, the coverage will not be applicable.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">Customer will have the option to select Assurance Plus for each product individually. The Assurance Plus premium will be calculated and charged based on selected products.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">For customized products, any alterations made to the customization of placed order may incur additional charges from the company. If the buyer chooses not to pay extra charges, a refund will be initiated.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">When a buyer returns the product under Assurance Plus, the initial step involves verifying the order and generating a new request for the exchanged product. If any modifications are detected during this process, the customer will be notified regarding any additional charges.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">Only the products that are covered will have the option to select the Assurance Plus.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">External Damages coverage.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">Claims are restricted to once for one year period and twice for three year period.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">Personalized products are non-returnable, except in the case where incorrect printing has occurred by the company. A refund will be issued limited to the product value excluding shipping, cover or any other charges if the company is unable to manufacture the ordered products.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">Print fading is not eligible for return or refund.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">If the claim is validly accepted by the company, the responsibility for shipping costs will lie with the company.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">When a user adds multiple products, user has the option to select a particular product from multiple products. However, for any specific product ordered in multiple quantities, Assurance Plus will cover the entire product.</li></ul><style>.warranty-content-inner h4 { font-size: 16px; color: #000; font-weight: 600;

Depth - Left" data-threshold-value="" data-restrict-dim="" data-validate="{'required-entry':true,'validate-item-size':{'minAllowed':0,'maxAllowed':999999}}" onselectstart="return false" autocomplete="off"></div> </li> </ul></div>                    <div class="measurements-popup-bottom">                    <div class="measurement-bottom"> <div class="leeway">Extra 2-3” Leeway&nbsp; <div class="field-tooltip toggle s_tooltip" data-trigger="true" data-dropdown-parent="true"><span class="field-tooltip-action action-help" tabindex="0" data-toggle="dropdown" data-bind="mageInit: {'dropdown':{'activeClass': '_active'}}" data-mage-init="{&quot;dropdown&quot;:{&quot;activeClass&quot;:&quot;_active&quot;}}" role="button" data-dropdown="true" aria-haspopup="true"></span> <div class="field-tooltip-content" data-target="dropdown">We add 2" and 3" leeway on the given width/depth for easy pull-in and pull-out.</div></div></div> <a href="https://cdn.coversandall.com/media/catalog/product/measure_image/l-shape-sofa-covers-design-7_1.pdf" data-bind="" id="how-measure-image" class="htmeasure icon_measure" target="_blank">How to Measure?</a> <div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>                    <div class="main-newpdp-popup-footer">                        <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="f-next">Next</a> data-prefix="option-label-color-92-item-" data-id="option-label-color-92-item-87" id="color_option" name="color_option" value="87"></div><div id="how-measurepop" style="display: none"><div class="modal-title measure-title">How to measure?</div><div class="measurepopbox"><div class="measurepop"> <div class="pull-left"> <div class="lebel"><span>DO'S</span></div> <img src="https://www.coversandall.com/static/version1740640835/frontend/Cov/dcovers/en_US/images/do-measure.png" alt="Do Measure"> <ul class="points"> <li>Give exact measurement from edge to edge.</li> <li>We add 1" to 2" leeway on the given width/depth for easy pull-in and pull-out.</li> <li>The height dimensions will remain same as provided by you.</li> </ul> </div> <div class="pull-right"> <div class="lebel"><span>DON'TS</span></div> <img src="https://www.coversandall.com/static/version1740640835/frontend/Cov/dcovers/en_US/images/dont-measure.png" alt="Don't Measure"> <ul class="points"> <li>Don’t provide extra inches in your measurement.</li> <li>Extra inches to measurement might not fit cover like a glove.</li> <li>We do not provide leeway on height side so that your cover fits perfect.</li> </ul> </div> </div></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>                    <div class="main-newpdp-popup-footer">                        <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-mage-init="{&quot;tabs&quot;:{&quot;openedState&quot;:&quot;active&quot;}}" role="tablist"> <div class="data item title active" data-role="collapsible" id="tab-label-productdescription" role="tab" data-trigger="true" tabindex="0" data-collapsible="true" aria-selected="true" aria-expanded="true"><a class="data switch product-info-tabs" tabindex="-1" data-toggle="trigger" href="#productdescription" id="tab-label-productdescription-title">Product Description</a></div><div class="data item content" aria-labelledby="tab-label-productdescription-title" id="productdescription" data-role="content" aria-hidden="false"> <div class="product attribute description"> <div class="value"><div class="full-width-container"><div class="new-content"><div class="description-section">&nbsp;</div><h3>Perfect Fit for L-Shaped Sofas</h3><p>Protect your outdoor sectional sofa with our L shaped couch cover made specifically to fit your exact dimensions. Covering outdoor sectionals can be a challenge, but our custom-fit covers ensure an ideal fit every time. These covers protect your furniture from the most extreme weather conditions, securing your investment for years to come. With durable tie-downs and tough fabric, these waterproof sofa covers offer unmatched long-lasting protection.</p><h3>Premium Materials for Durability</h3><p>Our outdoor couch covers provide superior performance with a range of fabric options that can withstand harsh climates. Designed for durability, the materials used in these covers for outdoor couch protect your furniture while maintaining a stylish appearance. Lightweight yet durable, these covers are easy to maintain and work for various settings. Whether you need full waterproofing or UV-resistant options, our L shape sectional couch covers deliver the perfect combination of function and visual appeal.</p><h3>Customizable Design for a Personal Touch</h3><p>Personalize your custom couch covers with your preferred text, logo, or even a house number. Choose from a wide variety of fonts, colors, and images printed with UV print technology to create a unique look. Our easy-to-follow measuring guide contains measurement instructions for precise sizing, with a leeway of 2" to 3". The tie-down options, such as elastic bottoms, push-clips, drawstrings and split zippers keep the covers for L shape couches securely in place. You can also add accessories like airbags to maintain the cover’s shape or include grommets for additional protection.</p><h3>Versatile Protection with Low Maintenance</h3><p>Our covers for L shaped couches are perfect for both outdoor and indoor use, providing full protection against dust, dirt, water, and harmful UV rays. These outdoor sectional couch covers are designed for easy maintenance and long-lasting use. Planning to order in bulk? Take advantage of our competitive pricing and bulk discounts to cover all your sectionals.</p><p>Order now and safeguard your sectional furniture with our custom <a href="https://www.coversandall.com/patio-furniture-covers/sectional-covers/l-shaped-sofa-cover/l-shape-sofa-covers-design-5-p">L shaped couch covers</a>!</p></div></div></div></div></div> <div class="data item title" data-role="collapsible" id="tab-label-tiedownsgrommets" role="tab" data-trigger="true" tabindex="0" data-collapsible="true" aria-selected="false" aria-expanded="false"><a class="data switch product-info-tabs" tabindex="-1" data-toggle="trigger" href="#tiedownsgrommets" id="tab-label-tiedownsgrommets-title">Tie downs / Grommets</a></div><div class="data item content" aria-labelledby="tab-label-tiedownsgrommets-title" id="tiedownsgrommets" data-role="content" style="display: none;" aria-hidden="true"> &nbsp; </div> <div class="data item title last" data-role="collapsible" id="tab-label-questions" role="tab" data-trigger="true" tabindex="0" data-collapsible="true" aria-selected="false" aria-expanded="false"><a class="data switch product-info-tabs" tabindex="-1" data-toggle="trigger" href="#questions" id="tab-label-questions-title">Q&amp;A <span class="counter">3</span></a></div><div class="data item content" aria-labelledby="tab-label-questions-title" id="questions" data-role="content" style="display: none;" aria-hidden="true"> &nbsp; </div> </div></div></div> <div class="container"><div id="reviewPageWidget"><h2 style="display: block;"> Customer Review</h2><div id="reviewPageWidgetInner"><div id="reviews-container">

});</script><script>
  // Function to get a query parameter's value from the URL
  function getQueryParam(paramName) {
      var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
      return urlParams.get(paramName) || "Not Available";
  }

  // Function to get the "q" value from the URL
  function getSearchQuery() {
      var url = window.location.href;
      var match = url.match(/[?&]q=([^&]*)/); // Matches "?q=" or "&q=" followed by any value
      return match ? decodeURIComponent(match[1]) : "Not Available";
  }

  // Function to extract "utm_source" from either the query string or the URL path
  function getUtmSource() {
      var url = window.location.href;

      // Check in query string
      var utmFromQuery = getQueryParam("utm_source");
      if (utmFromQuery !== "Not Available") {
          return utmFromQuery;
      }

      // Check in path (e.g., "/utm_source/google/")
      var match = url.match(/utm_source\/([^/]+)/); // Matches "utm_source/<value>"
      return match ? decodeURIComponent(match[1]) : "Not Available";
  }

  // Main execution
  (function() {
      var sourceMedium = getUtmSource(); // Get utm_source as source_medium
      var searchTerm = getSearchQuery(); // Get "q" parameter as search_term

      // Retrieve other values
      var pageType = _satellite.getVar('pageType');
      var productCategory = _satellite.getVar('ParentCategoryPagePath');
      var loginStatus = digitalData.user.loginStatus;
      var visitNumber = _satellite.getVar("visitNumber");
      var rfmScore = _satellite.getVar("rfmScore");
      var rfmSegmentName = _satellite.getVar("RFM Segment Name");

      // Log all values for debugging
      console.log("Page Type:", pageType);
      console.log("Product Category:", productCategory);
      console.log("Login Status:", loginStatus);
      console.log("Visit Number:", visitNumber);
      console.log("Source Medium:", sourceMedium);
      console.log("Search Term:", searchTerm);
      console.log("RFM Score:", rfmScore);
      console.log("RFM Segment Name:", rfmSegmentName);

      // Integrate with Klaviyo's _learnq.push
      _learnq.push(['track', 'Adb_Page_Type', {
          "Page Type": pageType,
          "Product Category": productCategory,
          "Login Status": loginStatus,
          "Visit Number": visitNumber,
          "Source Medium": sourceMedium,
          "Search Term": searchTerm,
          "RFM Score": rfmScore,
          "RFM Segment Name": rfmSegmentName
      }]);
  })();
</script>

class="warranty-table-content"><p class="warranty-content"><em>Mistake with measurements? Don’t like what you got? You are covered.</em> <a id="warranty_info_popup">Learn more</a></p><div class="popup-main-content" id="warranty-main-content-popup" style="display:none"><div class="warranty-content-head"><h4 class="warranty-t-2">What’s Covered ?</h4></div><div class="warranty-content-inner"><div class="warranty-year-info"><ul class="warranty-year-info-content"> <li class="warranty-content-77"><h4>1 Year<span>Assurance Plus</span></h4><span class="warranty-price">$57.50</span> <ul class="warranty-detailed-info"><li>Defects</li> <li>Shipping Defects</li> <li>Color Issues</li> <li>Personalization Errors</li> <li>Customer Support</li> <li>Claim <strong class="font-bold">Once</strong></li></ul></li> <li class="warranty-content-289"><h4>3 Years<span>Assurance Plus</span></h4><span class="warranty-price">$85.18</span> <ul class="warranty-detailed-info"><li>Defects</li> <li>Shipping Defects</li> <li>Color Issues</li> <li>Personalization Errors</li> <li>Customer Support</li> <li>Claim <strong class="font-bold">Twice</strong></li></ul></li> </ul></div><h4>Terms and Conditions:</h4><ul class="warranty-terms-content"><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">This policy is contingent upon the main price of the product purchase. However, if the purchase amount exceeds $2000, the coverage will not be applicable.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">Customer will have the option to select Assurance Plus for each product individually. The Assurance Plus premium will be calculated and charged based on selected products.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">For customized products, any alterations made to the customization of placed order may incur additional charges from the company. If the buyer chooses not to pay extra charges, a refund will be initiated.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">When a buyer returns the product under Assurance Plus, the initial step involves verifying the order and generating a new request for the exchanged product. If any modifications are detected during this process, the customer will be notified regarding any additional charges.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">Only the products that are covered will have the option to select the Assurance Plus.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">External Damages coverage.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">Claims are restricted to once for one year period and twice for three year period.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">Personalized products are non-returnable, except in the case where incorrect printing has occurred by the company. A refund will be issued limited to the product value excluding shipping, cover or any other charges if the company is unable to manufacture the ordered products.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">Print fading is not eligible for return or refund.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">If the claim is validly accepted by the company, the responsibility for shipping costs will lie with the company.</li><li class="warranty-terms-info-items">When a user adds multiple products, user has the option to select a particular product from multiple products. However, for any specific product ordered in multiple quantities, Assurance Plus will cover the entire product.</li></ul><style>.warranty-content-inner h4 { font-size: 16px; color: #000; font-weight: 600;
}
ul.warranty-terms-content { list-style: decimal; list-style-position: outside; font-weight: 400; padding-left: 12px;
}

data-prefix="option-label-color-92-item-" data-id="option-label-color-92-item-87" id="color_option" name="color_option" value="87"></div><div id="how-measurepop" style="display: none"><div class="modal-title measure-title">How to measure?</div><div class="measurepopbox"><div class="measurepop"> <div class="pull-left"> <div class="lebel"><span>DO'S</span></div> <img src="https://www.coversandall.com/static/version1740640835/frontend/Cov/dcovers/en_US/images/do-measure.png" alt="Do Measure"> <ul class="points"> <li>Give exact measurement from edge to edge.</li> <li>We add 1" to 2" leeway on the given width/depth for easy pull-in and pull-out.</li> <li>The height dimensions will remain same as provided by you.</li> </ul> </div> <div class="pull-right"> <div class="lebel"><span>DON'TS</span></div> <img src="https://www.coversandall.com/static/version1740640835/frontend/Cov/dcovers/en_US/images/dont-measure.png" alt="Don't Measure"> <ul class="points"> <li>Don’t provide extra inches in your measurement.</li> <li>Extra inches to measurement might not fit cover like a glove.</li> <li>We do not provide leeway on height side so that your cover fits perfect.</li> </ul> </div> </div></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>                    <div class="main-newpdp-popup-footer">                        <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-mage-init="{&quot;tabs&quot;:{&quot;openedState&quot;:&quot;active&quot;}}" role="tablist"> <div class="data item title active" data-role="collapsible" id="tab-label-productdescription" id="productdescription" data-role="content" aria-hidden="false"> <div class="product attribute description"> <div class="value"><div class="full-width-container"><div class="new-content"><div class="description-section">&nbsp;</div><h3>Perfect Fit for L-Shaped Sofas</h3><p>Protect your outdoor sectional sofa with our L shaped couch cover made specifically to fit your exact dimensions. Covering outdoor sectionals can be a challenge, but our custom-fit covers ensure an ideal fit every time. These covers protect your furniture from the most extreme weather conditions, securing your investment for years to come. With durable tie-downs and tough fabric, these waterproof sofa covers offer unmatched long-lasting protection.</p><h3>Premium Materials for Durability</h3><p>Our outdoor couch covers provide superior performance with a range of fabric options that can withstand harsh climates. Designed for durability, the materials used in these covers for outdoor couch protect your furniture while maintaining a stylish appearance. Lightweight yet durable, these covers are easy to maintain and work for various settings. Whether you need full waterproofing or UV-resistant options, our L shape sectional couch covers deliver the perfect combination of function and visual appeal.</p><h3>Customizable Design for a Personal Touch</h3><p>Personalize your custom couch covers with your preferred text, logo, or even a house number. Choose from a wide variety of fonts, colors, and images printed with UV print technology to create a unique look. Our easy-to-follow measuring guide contains measurement instructions for precise sizing, with a leeway of 2" to 3". The tie-down options, such as elastic bottoms, push-clips, drawstrings and split zippers keep the covers for L shape couches securely in place. You can also add accessories like airbags to maintain the cover’s shape or include grommets for additional protection.</p><h3>Versatile Protection with Low Maintenance</h3><p>Our covers for L shaped couches are perfect for both outdoor and indoor use, providing full protection against dust, dirt, water, and harmful UV rays. These outdoor sectional couch covers are designed for easy maintenance and long-lasting use. Planning to order in bulk? Take advantage of our competitive pricing and bulk discounts to cover all your sectionals.</p><p>Order now and safeguard your sectional furniture with our custom <a href="https://www.coversandall.com/patio-furniture-covers/sectional-covers/l-shaped-sofa-cover/l-shape-sofa-covers-design-5-p">L shaped couch covers</a>!</p></div></div></div></div></div> <div class="data item title" data-role="collapsible" id="tab-label-tiedownsgrommets" role="tab" data-trigger="true" tabindex="0" data-collapsible="true" aria-selected="false" aria-expanded="false"><a class="data switch product-info-tabs" tabindex="-1" data-toggle="trigger" href="#tiedownsgrommets" id="tab-label-tiedownsgrommets-title">Tie downs / Grommets</a></div><div class="data item content" aria-labelledby="tab-label-tiedownsgrommets-title" id="tiedownsgrommets" data-role="content" style="display: none;" aria-hidden="true"> &nbsp; </div> <div class="data item title last" data-role="collapsible" id="tab-label-questions" role="tab" data-trigger="true" tabindex="0" data-collapsible="true" aria-selected="false" aria-expanded="false"><a class="data switch product-info-tabs" tabindex="-1" data-toggle="trigger" href="#questions" id="tab-label-questions-title">Q&amp;A <span class="counter">3</span></a></div><div class="data item content" aria-labelledby="tab-label-questions-title" id="questions" data-role="content" style="display: none;" aria-hidden="true"> &nbsp; </div> </div></div></div> <div class="container"><div id="reviewPageWidget"><h2 style=""> Customer Review</h2><div id="reviewPageWidgetInner"><div id="reviews-container">

function s_getLoadTime() {
 if (!window.s_loadT) {
	 var b = new
	 Date().getTime(), o = window.performance ? performance.timing : 0, a = o ? o.requestStart : window.inHeadTS || 0;
	 s_loadT = a ? Math.round((b - a) / 100) : ''
 }
 return s_loadT
}

 * Plugin: getTimeParting 3.4

  2012:'3/25,10/28', 
  2013:'3/31,10/27',

function getTimeParting(a){a=document.documentMode?void 0:a||"Etc/GMT";a=(new Date).toLocaleDateString("en-US",{timeZone:a, minute:"numeric",hour:"numeric",weekday:"long",day:"numeric",year:"numeric",month:"long"});a=/([a-zA-Z]+).*?([a-zA-Z]+).*?([0-9]+).*?([0-9]+)(.*?)([0-9])(.*)/.exec(a);return"year="+a[4]+" | month="+a[2]+" | date="+a[3]+" | day="+a[1]+" | time="+(a[6]+a[7])}


/*
 * Plugin: getNewRepeat 1.2 - Returns whether user is new or repeat
 */
s.getNewRepeat = new Function("d", "cn", "" +
    "var s=this,e=new Date(),cval,sval,ct=e.getTime();d=d?d:30;cn=cn?cn:" +
    "'s_nr';e.setTime(ct+d*24*60*60*1000);cval=s.c_r(cn);if(cval.length=" +
    "=0){s.c_w(cn,ct+'-New',e);return'New';}sval=s.split(cval,'-');if(ct" +
    "-sval[0]<30*60*1000&&sval[1]=='New'){s.c_w(cn,ct+'-New',e);return'N" +
    "ew';}else{s.c_w(cn,ct+'-Repeat',e);return'Repeat';}");

 */

});</script><script>
  // Function to get a query parameter's value from the URL
  function getQueryParam(paramName) {
      var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
      return urlParams.get(paramName) || "Not Available";
  }

  // Function to get the "q" value from the URL
  function getSearchQuery() {
      var url = window.location.href;
      var match = url.match(/[?&]q=([^&]*)/); // Matches "?q=" or "&q=" followed by any value
      return match ? decodeURIComponent(match[1]) : "Not Available";
  }

  // Function to extract "utm_source" from either the query string or the URL path
  function getUtmSource() {
      var url = window.location.href;

      // Check in query string
      var utmFromQuery = getQueryParam("utm_source");
      if (utmFromQuery !== "Not Available") {
          return utmFromQuery;
      }

      // Check in path (e.g., "/utm_source/google/")
      var match = url.match(/utm_source\/([^/]+)/); // Matches "utm_source/<value>"
      return match ? decodeURIComponent(match[1]) : "Not Available";
  }

  // Main execution
  (function() {
      var sourceMedium = getUtmSource(); // Get utm_source as source_medium
      var searchTerm = getSearchQuery(); // Get "q" parameter as search_term

      // Retrieve other values
      var pageType = _satellite.getVar('pageType');
      var productCategory = _satellite.getVar('ParentCategoryPagePath');
      var loginStatus = digitalData.user.loginStatus;
      var visitNumber = _satellite.getVar("visitNumber");
      var rfmScore = _satellite.getVar("rfmScore");
      var rfmSegmentName = _satellite.getVar("RFM Segment Name");

      // Log all values for debugging
      console.log("Page Type:", pageType);
      console.log("Product Category:", productCategory);
      console.log("Login Status:", loginStatus);
      console.log("Visit Number:", visitNumber);
      console.log("Source Medium:", sourceMedium);
      console.log("Search Term:", searchTerm);
      console.log("RFM Score:", rfmScore);
      console.log("RFM Segment Name:", rfmSegmentName);

      // Integrate with Klaviyo's _learnq.push
      _learnq.push(['track', 'Adb_Page_Type', {
          "Page Type": pageType,
          "Product Category": productCategory,
          "Login Status": loginStatus,
          "Visit Number": visitNumber,
          "Source Medium": sourceMedium,
          "Search Term": searchTerm,
          "RFM Score": rfmScore,
          "RFM Segment Name": rfmSegmentName
      }]);
  })();
</script>
